title: Tickle His Pickle!: Your Hands-On Guide to Penis Pleasing
description: TICKLE HIS PICKLE by Sadie Allison is the world's first penis instruction manual for women who want to rekindle passion, reawaken romance and revive red-hot sex. The penis is every guy's pleasure center, yet no woman has ever received the instruction manual until now. Includes more than 50 hand and oral love-making techniques with 100 titillating illustrations to guide your learning process. Empowers women to embrace their sexuality by learning new tricks for pleasing their partners.
author: Sadie Allison
